## TryCpScenario.create() method

Factory method to create a new scenario.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static create(serverUrl: URL): Promise<TryCpScenario>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  serverUrl | URL | The URL of the TryCp server to connect to. |
